page.title: 22Trade in landrake
page.content:
The village has one shop left now, which is a general store with your daily goods, magazines and papers, an off licence as well as other things and a post office is also attached to it.
The local pub is called the Buller's Arms which has a bar and a lounge which is well used. It has basic pub meals, a pub quiz on a wednesday occasional discos and other live music. It has your normal dart board and pool table which are used for pleasure as well as being used for local pub leagues.
Contribution by: Ben Nicholson
